title: Emotionally Charged
description: Overwhelming teenage emotions can be deadly when they grant superpowers.Livvy has always been good at reading emotions.When disaster strikes and she has to fight to survive, she learns that this gift is more powerful than she ever imagined.She is an Empath.Livvy is swept into a world of superheroes, luxury ... and hidden secrets. When she meets her opposite, a Blocker who can lock an Empath's powers away forever, Livvy is caught up in a supernatural battle.Can she keep her powerful emotions under control when the life of the boy she loves is threatened?If you like non-stop action, super-charged romance, and dire consequences, then you'll love this young adult superhero tale.Pick up this quick-read novella and join the world of the Empaths today.BONUS! This paperback also includes extra Empath Chronicles content for free- the short story Emotionally Scarred.
author: Selina Fenech
